reviewText: Not a professional production, but the scenes were good.
I've been to most of the sites so it was nice to reminisce. As others pointed out, it could use more narration.
More information about what was being seen would have been nice.
Fun, exploratory, and informative. Discover what drift diving is all about!
Sucked sucked sucked sucked sucked do not waste your time. It gets worse the more you watch I . Did I say it sucked . Do not waste your time.

I am not sure what the previous reviewer was upset about. This video is not meant to be a big professional production. Just a simple video showing things to do in Cozumel if you are diving. I found this to be entertaining. I also want to point out I don't know who these divers are but don't do what they do. They dive in situations where more equipment and training should be used and they do not use proper techniques. Other then that if you are a junkie for blowing bubbles and are stuck on shore it is worth your 30 min.

This documentary is nothing but a collection of homemade videos without commentary, explanation or narrative.  It is uninspiring and uninspired.  I definitely do not recommend that anybody interested in caves, diving or Yucatan purchase this DVD.
This was very interesting to see just what is below the surface of the ocean and didn't know of all the caves that have been found and explored recently.
